description: This source file provides an implementation for creating and possibly managing a BREE (BSP Run-time Execution Engine) object in the context of the BroadWay Service Delivery System. It primarily defines a function 'BreeCreateSpo' which creates a new BREE object using 'BreeSpoCreate'. The file includes licensing, module description, and a simple function that wraps object creation.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE BreeCreateSpo(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Factory function to create a new BREE object, wrapping the internal creation function 'BreeSpoCreate'.
